nodes.text: Refuse Row was the name given to the entrance street of Shadow Town, a prison complex operated by the reconstituted Sith Empire on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. Unlike the rest of the sector, Refuse Row was not monitored or patrolled by the Empire, allowing the Republic Strategic Information Service to set up a base there.
Refuse Row appears as part of Shadow Town on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
